channel.title: devils' newsletter
channel.description: the latest news from the devils' den.

item.title: tiny update
item.description: new links added under neighbors and new screenshots added to the yume nikki gallery

item.title: art of various kinds
item.description: there's two new illustrations in the 2023 gallery, and i posted a new poem as well. this time, it's written in portuguese- don't you worry, i included a translation.

item.title: dream diary
item.description: created a mini shrine for yume nikki screenshots, and added some ascii art.

item.title: i love css i say as i get everything wrong
item.description: well, it sure was a day. i might have gone a little insane over not getting the css to work properly with certain resolutions- thankfully ashton aiston.scungled.gay came to my rescue. oh, right. the update is that there are new illustrations. and ascii art is here too.

item.title: new beginnings?
item.description: well, not really. i reworked the layout and many pages, but the text (and spirit!) of the website remains mostly unchanged... additionally, there's new illustrations and the accessibility guide has been updated. New links too!
